title: bhakti shei
sahitya:
bhakti shei anudinamum paramAtmanai bhajanai shei anudinamum manamE nI


anupallavi

  sujana rakSakA parishuddha paramAkSarA suguNa guNAtIta sundarAngA enrE


caraNam    annai tandaiyinum anbu mighundavA Ananda nAyakA adhyAtma rAmA Om
cinmaya rAdhAnandA shrI harikrSNA Om shiva nArAyaNa dEvAdi dEvA enE
